blocks.text: Querying for a list of records returns a limited dataset for all records. This includes model attributes and foreign keys. These records can be further refined with the use of filters.

runs.text: Querying for a list of records returns a limited dataset for all records. This includes model attributes and foreign keys. These records can be further refined with the use of filters.

blocks.text: Querying for a single record returns the most complete dataset. All model attributes and associations are returned with their own attributes and foreign keys.

runs.text: Querying for a single record returns the most complete dataset. All model attributes and associations are returned with their own attributes and foreign keys.
